<line: 17> CONFIDENTIAL (29 CFR S1601.7a)
<line: 18> EEOC Charge No.
<line: 19> EEOC Representative
<line: 20> Telephone No.
<line: 21> Daniel Gajda,
<line: 22> 440-2017-04893
<line: 23> (312) 869-8131
<line: 24> Investigator

[TITLE]
<line: 26> THE EEOC IS CLOSING ITS FILE ON THIS CHARGE FOR THE FOLLOWING REASON:

[TEXT]
<line: 28> The facts alleged in the charge fail to state a claim under any of the statutes enforced by the EEOC

[TEXT]
<line: 30> Your allegations did not involve a disability as defined by the Americans With Disabilities Act.

[TEXT]
<line: 32> The Respondent employs less than the required number of employees or is not otherwise covered by the statutes.

[TEXT]
<line: 34> The EEOC issues the following determination: Based upon its investigation, the EEOC is unable to conclude that the
<line: 35> information obtained establishes violations of the statutes. This does not certify that the respondent is in compliance with.
<line: 36> the statutes. No finding is made as to any other issues that might be construed as having been raised by this charge..

[TEXT]
<line: 38> The EEOC has adopted the findings of the state or local fair employment practices agency that investigated this charge.

[TITLE]
<line: 40> - NOTICE OF SUIT RIGHTS -

[TEXT]
<line: 42> (See the additional information attached to this form.)

[TEXT]
<line: 44> Title Vll, the Americans with Disabilities Act, the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act, or the Age
<line: 45> Discrimination in Employment Act: This will be the only notice of dismissal and of your right to sue that we will send you.
<line: 46> You may file a lawsuit against the respondent(s) under federal law based on this charge in federal or state court. Your
<line: 47> lawsuit must be filed wiTHIN 90 DAYs of your receipt of this notice; or your right to sue based on this charge will be
<line: 48> Iost. (The time limit for filing suit based on a claim under state law may be different.)

[TEXT]
<line: 50> Equal Pay Act (EPA): EPA suits must be filed in federal or state court within 2 years (3 years for willful violations) of the.
<line: 51> alleged EPA underpayment. This means that backpay due for any violations that occurred more than 2 years (3 years)
<line: 52> before you file suit may not be collectible.
<line: 53> On behalf of the Commission.
<line: 54> 7/4/7
<line: 55> Enclosures(s)
<line: 56> Julianne Bowman,
<line: 57> (Date Mailed)
<line: 58> District Director

<line: 60> BAKER & MCKENZIE LLP
<line: 61> c/o CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
<line: 62> 300 East Randolph Street, Ste. 5000
<line: 63> Chicago, IL 60601

<line: 60> CONTINUING ACTION
<line: 61> THE PARTICULARS ARE (If additional paper is needed, attach extra sheet(s)):
<line: 62> I began my employment with Respondent in or around December 2015. My most recent position was.
<line: 63> Project Assistant. During my employment, I was subjected to sexual harassment which I rebuffed. I was
<line: 64> then demoted and had responsibilities taken away from me. I was also subjected to derogatory comments
<line: 65> regarding my accent. I complained to no avail. Subsequently, I was discharged on or about January 25
<line: 66> 2017 while younger, less experienced employees were not..
<line: 67> I believe that I have been discriminated against because of my sex, female, and national origin; Russian, and.
<line: 68> retaliated against fcr engaging in protected activity, in violation or Titie Vli of tne'Civii'Rights Act of 1964, as.
<line: 69> amended.
<line: 70> JJL 1 3 2017
<line: 71> I believe that I have been discriminated against because of my age, 52 (YOB: 1965), and retaliated against.
<line: 72> for engaging in protected activity, in violation of the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967, as.i
<line: 73> amended,
<line: 74> I want this charge filed with both the EEOC and the State or local Agency, if any. I.
<line: 75>  NOTARY - When necessary for State and Local Agency Requirements
<line: 76> will advise the agencies if I change my address or phone number and I will..
<line: 77>  cooperate fully with them in the processing of my charge in accordance with their
<line: 78> procedures.
<line: 79> I swear or affirm that I have read the above charge and that it is true to.
<line: 80> I declare under penalty of perjury that the above is true and correet..
<line: 81> the best of my knowledge, information and belief
<line: 82> SIGNATURE OF COMPLAINANT
